原句：The product/material produced is made of steel.

原句：The manufacturer distributes the product through its own online store.

原句：The industry is known for its high-quality products.
翻译：该行业以其高质量的产品而闻名。

原句：The position held by the CEO is very important.
翻译：首席执行官所持有的职位非常重要。

原句：The original broadcaster of the show is ABC.
翻译：该节目的原始播出商是ABC。

原句：The company is owned by John Smith.
翻译：该公司由约翰·史密斯所有。

原句：The company was founded by a group of entrepreneurs.
翻译：该公司由一群企业家创立。

原句：The distribution format of the product is digital.
翻译：该产品的分发格式是数字化的。

原句：The headquarters location of the company is in New York City.
翻译：该公司的总部位于纽约市。

原句：The stock exchange where the company's shares are traded is NASDAQ.
翻译：该公司的股票在纳斯达克上市交易。

原句：The currency used in the company's transactions is the US dollar.
翻译：该公司交易使用的货币是美国美元。

原句：The parent organization of the company is XYZ Corporation.
翻译：该公司的母公司是XYZ公司。

原句：The chief executive officer of the company is Jane Doe.
翻译：该公司的首席执行官是简·多。

原句：The director/manager of the company is responsible for overseeing operations.
翻译：该公司的董事/经理负责监督运营。

原句：The owner of the company is John Smith.
翻译：该公司的所有者是约翰·史密斯。

原句：The operator of the company is responsible for managing day-to-day operations.
翻译：该公司的运营商负责管理日常运营。

原句：The company is a member of the World Trade Organization.
翻译：该公司是世界贸易组织的成员。

原句：The employer of the company is known for its fair labor practices.
翻译：该公司的雇主以其公平的劳动实践而闻名。

原句：The chairperson of the company is responsible for leading board meetings.
翻译：该公司的董事长负责主持董事会会议。

原句：The platform used by the company is based on artificial intelligence.
翻译：该公司使用的平台基于人工智能。

原句：The subsidiary of the company is responsible for producing raw materials.
翻译：该公司的子公司负责生产原材料。

原句：The legal form of the company is a limited liability company.
翻译：该公司的法律形式是有限责任公司。

原句：The publisher of the company is known for its high-quality books.
翻译：该公司的出版商以其高质量的书籍而闻名。

原句：The developer of the company is responsible for creating innovative products.
翻译：该公司的开发人员负责创建创新产品。

原句：The location of formation of the company is in California.
翻译：该公司的成立地点在加利福尼亚州。

原句：The creator of the company is known for its groundbreaking technology.
翻译：该公司的创始人以其开创性的技术而闻名。
